quickprint.description: quickly print the variable at the cursor, the selected variable, or the clipboard content in customizable formats across multiple programming languages.
quickprint.commands.printWordOrSelectedT: quickprint: Print Word At Cursor Or Selected Text
quickprint.configuration.outputFormat.de: Configure the output format and position for print statements for different languages
quickprint.configuration.restoreCursorAf: Whether to restore the cursor position after inserting text.
quickprint.warningMessage.missingFormat: The print format for language () is not defined. Please configure it in the settings.
